item.name: Problem 1

query.description:
Keywords or phrases to search for in the article title and body.

Advanced search is supported here:

Surround phrases with quotes (") for exact match.
Prepend words or phrases that must appear with a + symbol. Eg: +bitcoin
Prepend words that must not appear with a - symbol. Eg: -bitcoin
Alternatively you can use the AND / OR / NOT keywords, and optionally group these with parenthesis. Eg: crypto AND (ethereum OR litecoin) NOT bitcoin.
The complete value for q must be URL-encoded. Max length: 500 chars.
The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ar, de, en, es, fr, he, it, nl, no, pt, ru, sv, ud, zh. Default: all languages returned.
User this to page through the results. Default: 1.

response.name: 200 OK

Alternatively you can use the AND / OR / NOT keywords, and optionally group these with parenthesis. Eg: crypto AND (ethereum OR litecoin) NOT bitcoin.
The complete value for q must be URL-encoded. Max length: 500 chars.
The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get headlines for. Possible options: ar, de, en, es, fr, he, it, nl, no, pt, ru, sv, ud, zh. Default: all languages returned.

item.description:
StartFragment

1.  Buat satu collection, dan memanfaatkan fitur environment dan lakukan request terhadap api yang ada di API Documentation menggunakan Postman. Lakukan request terhadap 3 target api berikut!
    1.  Target API 1
        1.  [https://newsapi.org/](https://newsapi.org/)
        2.  Lakukan request terhadap API minimal 1 API.
    2.  Target API 2
        1.  [https://swapi.dev/](https://swapi.dev/)
        2.  Lakukan request terhadap API minimal 1 API.
    3.  Target API 3
        1.  API Documentation: [https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis-docs/sepulsa/RentABook-API/1.0.0](https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis-docs/sepulsa/RentABook-API/1.0.0)
        2.  API Server: [https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/sepulsa/RentABook-API/1.0.0](https://app.swaggerhub.com/apis-docs/sepulsa/RentABook-API/1.0.0)
        3.  Lakukan request terhadap API dengan mengimplementasikan 4 Method GET, POST, PUT, DELETE.
